summary: This is a certificate of authenticity from Amazon employee Milonie Caldwell, declaring that documents produced by Amazon in response to a law enforcement request (Case No. 19 MAG 5896) are authentic business records. It is part of the evidence submission process for a criminal investigation.

persons.name: Milonie Caldwell
persons.role: Law Enforcement Response Specialist at Amazon
persons.context: Amazon employee who signed the certificate of authenticity declaring that documents produced by Amazon for law enforcement are authentic business records.

events.title: Execution of Amazon Certificate of Authenticity
events.description: Milonie Caldwell executed a certificate of authenticity in Seattle, Washington, declaring Amazon-produced documents for a law enforcement request are authentic business records.

keyFacts: Amazon produced documents in response to a law enforcement request related to criminal case 19 MAG 5896.
An Amazon employee certified under penalty of perjury that the produced documents are authentic business records.
The document is part of the evidence authentication process for a federal investigation, likely related to the Epstein case given the dataset context.
